recipes.title: Leetcode 322
recipes.method: Whenever I am trying to get the solution for n, I already have the solution for all the values below n which can be used. Create an array dp to keep track of all the solution from 0 to amount. Fill the dp array using the for loop from i=1 to amount. Try each coin one by one to crate amount i.  dp[i] = Math.min(dp[i],dp[i-coin]+1)
